response.overview: Skeptical young detective Ichabod Crane gets transferred to the hamlet of Sleepy Hollow, New York, where he is tasked with investigating the decapitations of three people – murders the townsfolk attribute to a legendary specter, The Headless Horseman.
response.title: Sleepy Hollow

titles.title: Sleepy Hollow, la légende du cavalier sans tête
La leyenda del jinete sin cabeza

cast.name: Miranda Richardson
cast.character: Lady Mary Van Tassel / Crone Witch
